biotools.summary: Deep-LUCIA (Deep Learning-based Universal Chromatin Interaction Annotator) is a deep learning based model to predict chromatin loops from genomic and epigenomic profile without CTCF signal.

bioschemas.name: DeepLUCIA
bioschemas.summary: Deep-LUCIA (Deep Learning-based Universal Chromatin Interaction Annotator) is a deep learning based model to predict chromatin loops from genomic and epigenomic profile without CTCF signal.
